code: import{applyMiddleware,compose,createStore}from'redux';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import rootReducer from"./../reducers/rootReducer";import rootSaga from"./../sagas/rootSaga";var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var composeEnhancers=compose;if(window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__&&process.env.NODE_ENV==="development"){composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__;}var enhancer=composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(sagaMiddleware));var store=createStore(rootReducer,enhancer);sagaMiddleware.run(rootSaga);export default store;
